entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 5.
